name: Heart // Beat
description:
This game was made for the UT_GG Game Jam, organised by the University of Twente.

This game relates to the theme of "In A Heartbeat" by having your character, enchanted by a wizard, to move at the same heartbeat as your enemies. With such a spell, who would survive for long?

The gameplay is essentially One Finger Death Punch mixed with the Rhythm Based gameplay of Crypt Of The NecroDancer.

Controls: Left and right mouse button.

Made by in total 3 people.
